content: I wish I could watch them. I will have to wait till monday when I have a good connection.

title: Iraq People Standing up For Peace Against Resistance

content: quote: Originally posted by klassylady25: Thought you might find this interesting. I know I did. ------------------------- Talks to a Reuters TV reporter about recent violence in Iraq, attacks being focused on Iraqi citizens, progress being made in Iraq, local Iraqi citizens preventing a suicide bomber attack and working out details for a security agreement between the United States and Iraq. Brig. Gen Bayer, Pt 1. 'http://www.dvidshub.net/?script=video/video_show.php&id=59457' Pt 2. Talks to a Reuters TV reporter about Iraqi detainees, what happens when a service member is wounded in Iraq and the morale of service members after a fellow service member is wounded 'http://www.dvidshub.net/?script=video/video_show.php&id=59458' ------------------------------------------ Did you actually listen to this Klassy? If so give us some particulars about what the Iraqis are doing to stop suicide bombers, because they seem to have been on holiday these last two weeks. I would sincerely hope they're making better progress finding peace than my 'fast' connection is, getting more than phrases out of the conversation.
